document.full_text: dirk nowitzki and the dallas mavericks have pulled off another stunning comeback, tying the n.b.a. finals at two games each.
document.title: ailing nowitzki lifts mavericks, nba finals tied
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki and the dallas mavericks have pulled off another stunning comeback, tying the n.b.a. finals at two games each.
